name: Hexed Pet: Hamster
description:
Hexed Pet: Hamster is a yaoi. BoyxBoy. 

A submission for the Valentines Jam

Micah loves pets so he was ecstatic when his grandma gave him a pet hamster to take care of. But one day when he returned home from school, he discovered that his pet is missing! Instead there was a naked man on his bed with...Hamster EARS?!

There he discovered that his pet was actually human. An unfortunate soul who got cursed and transformed into a rodent.The hexed individual had lost all his memories of when he was human, now thinks he's a hamster!  Micah then learnt the reason why his grandmother gave him the hamster wass because Micah himself, is a witch. A good witch. A white magic practitioner. And his first task? Is to help the cursed man recover his memories and turn him back fully into a human.

Maybe somehow, their feelings could develop into something?

-Choices and the ability to name pet

- Still under development. More chapters incoming

- Could possible turn into a series with more cursed pets as Love Interests

-Credits to Zapsplat.com and Dova-Syndrome for sound EFX and BGM

- Follow the progress on Twitter(https://twitter.com/crownea_vn) or Instagram(https://www.instagram.com/crownea_vn/)
